Keyword.Message: Flagged on all HTTP events dealing with potential personally identifiable information
Keyword.Name: HTTP_KEYWORD_LOG_PII_PRESENT

Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ServerSessionId" inType="win:UInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="UrlGroupId" inType="win:UInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="UrlContext" inType="win:UInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="DateTime" inType="win:FILETIME" outType="xs:dateTime"/> <data name="RemoteAddrLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="RemoteAddr" inType="win:Binary" outType="win:SocketAddress" length="RemoteAddrLength"/> <data name="LocalAddrLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="LocalAddr" inType="win:Binary" outType="win:SocketAddress" length="LocalAddrLength"/> <data name="KernelCached" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="HttpMajorVer" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="HttpMinorVer" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="BytesSent" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="BytesReceived" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="TimeTaken" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="UserName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Method" inType="win:AnsiString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="UriStem" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="UriQuery" inType="win:AnsiString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ProtocolStatus" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="ProtocolSubStatus" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="Win32Status" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:Win32Error"/> <data name="Host" inType="win:AnsiString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="UserAgent" inType="win:AnsiString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Cookie" inType="win:AnsiString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Referer" inType="win:AnsiString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="AppContext" inType="win:AnsiString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>
